```{r poission data, include=TRUE}

library(stats)

#set up data with lamb= 1,3,5
Pois1<-rpois(500,1)
Pois2<-rpois(500,3)
Pois3<-rpois(500,5)

#set up the X and Y to be bivariate distribution （P. Holgate. (1964)）
X<-Pois1+Pois3
Y<-Pois2+Pois3

#range, mean, variance, and empeirical dispersion of X and Y 
range(X)
range(Y)

mean(X) 
mean(Y) 

var(X) 
var(Y) 
 


as.matrix(X)
as.matrix(Y)
cor(as.matrix(X),as.matrix(Y)) 
#dispersion 
```
